name: Leaping Brain Labs
description: just a few bytes of brilliance.
overview:
Leaping Brain Labs, a Los Angeles-based software company founded by a group of digital video pioneers, experts and consultants, has developed and deployed a unique, enterprise-class, white-label digital media distribution platform called “MOD Machine”.

As iTunes was the “killer app”¬ù for music, replacing the physical audio CD, and the Kindle is gradually replacing books, so MOD Machine’s goal is to become the next video distribution standard, after VHS, DVD and Blu Ray disc.

MOD Machine has delivered over 270,000 products around the globe from 58 clients, including well-known brands like Black Belt Magazine, Guitar World, Signing Time and Alfred Publishing.
